alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 7:14PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yuma County through 800 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Otis, or 9 miles west of Yuma, moving southeast at 50 mph. Other showers and storms across Yuma County may be capable of producing strong downburst winds up to 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Yuma around 720 PM MDT. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 208 and 210, and between mile markers 212 and 269. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
